data.message: My daughter has a stalker and when she blocks him, he makes a new account. He's made several and he has threatened her. Please help!!

replies.message: We're sorry you're experiencing this, Stacey. The best way to report abusive content on Facebook is by using the Report link that appears near the content you would like to report. For some examples and to learn more, visit our Help Center at: https://www.Facebook.com/help/www/181495968648557/ -Chantal
